The AddonsController.java class is responsible for implementing javafx buttons for the addon items in our database.

The AlternativeController.java function implements javafx buttons for the alternative menu items in our database

PointOfSaleApp
 
PointOfSaleController
The PointOfSaleController class adds functions pertaining to the main POS page, notably those that control the user ID and PIN and switch to the manager and server views.
SalesController
Sales Controller implements the buttons and other functions for the Sales page, including the ability to look at all sales between two dates.
SalesItem
 
TeaController
This class implements button functionality of tea menu items.
TransactionsController
Implements all functions for the Transactions page.
TransactionsItem
 
ZReportController
The ZReportController class implements functions for the buttons of the Z report page, notably those for showing a Z report for an individual date and showing the X report of all transactions summed since the last Z report, as well as being able to reset to see the full list of Z reports.
ZReportItem
